### Credits to Peahead for writing the code in his original mod (Coolzero319)
nation_renaming_revisited_category = {
		reset_cosmetic_tag = {
		
            cost = 0
            icon = GFX_decision_icon_revisited
			visible = {
				is_subject = no
				OR = {
					original_tag = ROOT
					ROOT = {
						OR = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							is_puppet_of = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
			available = {
				always = yes
			}
			complete_effect = {
				ROOT = {
					drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = RESET_COSMETIC_TAG_TT
			}
		}
		king_afghanistan = {
		
            cost = 0
            days_re_enable = 0
            days_remove = 1
            icon = GFX_decision_icon_revisited
			visible = { 
				OR = {
					original_tag = AFG
					AFG = {
						OR = {
							is_subject_of = ROOT
							is_puppet_of = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
			available = {
				is_subject = no
				AFG = {
					OR = {
						has_government = neutrality
					}
				}
			}
			remove_effect = {
				AFG = {set_cosmetic_tag = KING_AFG}
			}
		}
